title: When will the iPhone 12 launch, 2020 or 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most probably this year apple has already launch its series 3 apple smartphone 6 , so there is no official statement from apple side for the releasing of apple 12 , hopefully we can assume that they will launch in 2021 November. If they launched sonner then it will be plus point and all the apple lover is happy but due to the current suitation covid all big compines are holding there products not to launch in 2020. The reason is quit obvious no sale no human power to produce .

So far, Apple has announced that iPhone 12 will be released one or two months late, mostly due to the impact of the coronavirus pandemic. I could see the iPhone 12 being delayed until 2021 but I don’t think that will happen as the pandemic is gradually being compensated in quite a few countries. I believe iPhone 12 will be launched around Christmas.
